author: danderson
msg: Allow repository names with n prefix directories in svnserve authz.
This is to avoid aliasing problems if several repositories have the
same basename in different directories inside the svnserve root.
Subject: Re: Relative behaviours of authz in mod_authz_svn and svnserve
(find_repos): Use svn_path_is_child to extract the full, n-depth

author: kfogel
msg: (svn_opt_revision_value): Clarify purpose of this new type,
following up to r16649 and r16652.
